extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the most life-like computer characters in a relaxing game of Championship Gin and treat yourself to a much-deserved break. Soothing jewel tones, cheerful HD graphics, helpful hints, and charming characters help you enjoy a fun card game. You set the pace, choose your challenge level, and your favorite variation. Sneak a few hands of Hearts in throughout your day, or sit down and enjoy a full game.Don't take our word for it!  Reviews from our players:***** "Just like I used to play with Grandpa"***** "This is my favorite Gin Rummy computer game to play when the girls aren't around."A step-up from a lonely game of Solitaire, Championship Gin Rummy delivers a game with personality:+ Discover 9 amusing computer opponents to both challenge and entertain you+ Enjoy a sense of accomplishment as you (re)master Gin Rummy card play+ Easily play using taps, drag and drop, or our innovative zoom-n-play+ Sharpen your skills with Questie, our adorable in-game DreamCoachâ¢ dragon+ Improve your game with our HINTS as you learn not just what to play, but why+ Enjoy unlimited UNDOs and REPLAY hands until you perfect your play+ Explore in-game options that allow you to cheat in numerous ways and play exciting variationsEnjoy unlimited free Gin Rummy games with this interactive version. Playing cards is simple and an intuitive menu system will let you explore a variety of game options. Easy enough for your inner child and engaging enough for your adult side. You'll enjoy unlocking options that keep you engaged once you've mastered the free version.Universal app features HD graphics for both hi-res tablet devices and newer Android phones running Honeycomb or Ice Cream Sandwich (3.x) as well as support for older Android phones running Froyo 2.2 or Gingerbread 2.3.For even more challenge, you can optionally upgrade to Player's Club to get these benefits:  * Practice - Sharpen your skills with Auto Hint, Play Suggested, Repass, Replay  * No Ads - Streamline game and remove in-house and third-party banner ads  * Cheats - Indulge your dark side with View cards, Redeal, Custom Hand, Illegal Plays, Playout Game  * More Variations - 7 new Gin Rummy game variations to learn and enjoy:     + 7-card - Hold rotation for passing + Low Club lead     + Simple - Hold rotation for passing + Low Club lead     + Boxes - Bonus points for capturing Jack of Diamonds     + Rainbow - Work with your partner for team scoring     + Rush - Value-based scoring vary with pips on card     + Race - Bonus points for hitting exact score gates     + Oklahoma - It's all upside down!  * Masters Bots - Highest level of mastery (3 new characters - Chuckles, Sparky, Starla)  * Personalized Avatar - Put yourself into the game with camera or photo  * Custom Bot Creator - Create new, custom opponents.  Import photos and set styles  * Customization - 3 new custom table backgrounds and 3 new card decks to play with

reviews.title: Poor interface
reviews.comment: Cards are difficult to distinguish on phone screen. Can\'t override automatic sorting. If you accidentally touch the table when it is your turn, the game takes off on its own. First game I purchased,  but all other gin rummy games I tried were as good or better--and free. Not recommend!
reviews.author: Chris Cash

reviews.title: Hard to play

reviews.comment: The game is ok, but being forced to buy to advance was not revealed before downloading. Wouldn\'t mind keeping the game, but it\'s definitely not worth paying for.
